issue.message: This view is not constrained horizontally: at runtime it will jump to the left unless you add a horizontal constraint
The array "colorPicker" in values-pt has no declaration in the base `values` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
`@+id/tvSize` is not a sibling in the same `ConstraintLayout`
Must use `app:tint` instead of `android:tint`
Format string '`title_notification_failed`' is not a valid format string so it should not be passed to `String.format`
Incorrect formatting string `title_privacy_description`; missing conversion character in '`% S`' ?
Incorrect formatting string `title_privacy_description`; missing conversion character in '`% S`' ?
issue.errorLine1: O SimpleEmail não coleta nenhuma informação, não requer permissões desnecessárias e é 100% Software Livre.

issue.message: Incorrect formatting string `title_privacy_description`; missing conversion character in '`% f`' ?
Incorrect formatting string `title_privacy_description`; missing conversion character in '`% s`' ?
issue.errorLine1: SimpleEmail non raccoglie alcuna informazione, non richiede autorizzazioni non necessarie ed è 100% software libero.

issue.message: Incorrect formatting string `title_privacy_description`; missing conversion character in '`% s`' ?
issue.errorLine1: SimpleEmail no recopila ninguna información, no requiere permisos innecesarios y es 100 % software libre.

issue.message: "message_gmail_note" is not translated in "fi" (Finnish), "bg" (Bulgarian), "hu" (Hungarian), "uk" (Ukrainian), "ca" (Catalan), "sr" (Serbian), "sv" (Swedish), "ko" (Korean), "af" (Afrikaans), "gl" (Galician), "el" (Greek), "iw" (Hebrew), "cs" (Czech), "vi" (Vietnamese), "nb" (Norwegian Bokmål), "ja" (Japanese), "az" (Azerbaijani), "fa" (Persian), "pl" (Polish), "da" (Danish), "ro" (Romanian)
issue.errorLine1: <string name="message_gmail_note">Since January 2020, Gmail restricted the OAuth scopes, and now requires authorization to authenticate, we are looking for the best way to fix OAuth authentication without private libraries.<br/><br/> As a temporary solution you need to allow normal authentication or what Google calls <i>\"less secure apps\"</i>.<br/><br/><b>Instructions here:</b> https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/6010255</br></string>

issue.message: The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (0, 1), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.

Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@color/colorWidgetBackground` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/AppThemeLight`)
Add suffix `-ktx` to enable the Kotlin extensions for this library
